entry.title: Labyrinth-Void 2.0.1 Update
entry.summary: Hi players, a new update has gone live that fixes a few bugs and improves menu navigation. A x86 version is no longer included in…
entry.content:
Hi players, a new update has gone live that fixes a few bugs and improves menu navigation. A x86 version is no longer included in the game package since it doubles the file size of the game even though only the x64 package is used on Xbox. I also updated the cover art but to see the change on Xbox you may have to delete and redownload the game.

That's it for this update, if you come across any issues send them my way and I will look into them.

entry.title: Welcome To Our Remastered Website
entry.summary: With that being said, if you find any issues use our contact page or comment sections to let us know. As for what's coming up…
entry.content: With that being said, if you find any issues use our contact page or comment sections to let us know. As for what's coming up on the horizon regarding our projects, Labyrinth-Void will be getting a update this month to smash a few bugs. Another game project is also in the works that will be releasing next month. Bookmark our blog page or use your favorite RSS feed reader to get the latest updates.
